name: Shape Escape (itch)
description:
Escape the dungeon by shapeshifting your hero!

HOW TO PLAY?

Use The Keys (A,S,D,F) (or either click with the mouse on the icons) to shapeshift your hero.

You can shift between these charakters:

SPACEMAN: He can walk to the left and right. He automatically turns if a wall occurs.
FROG: The frog can jump!
BIRD: The bird can fly upwards!
STONE: The stone is invincible!

HAVE FUN!!!
